name: BattleTech: The Crescent Hawk's Inception
description:
BattleTech: The Crescent Hawk's Inception is a RPG game developed by Westwood Studios and Westwood Associates. It was originally released in 1988. Infocom published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play BattleTech: The Crescent Hawk's Inception on Commodore / Amiga, Atari ST, Apple II and PC.
It was produced by Christopher Erhardt. Brett Sperry directed the game. It was scored by Paul S. Mudra.
